system.notes:
The most ancient suits of armour from the days of the Thunder Warriors and the unification of Terra. Rarely complete, often missing the legs which were unpowered.
Enhanced Strength: +15-+25 depending on suit, Subsystems: None. Manual Dexterity Modifier: -15. Additional -10 to Concealment and Silent Move. +15 to Tests to prevent Cohesion Damage, +30 Fellowship Bonus with Space Marines and Ecclesiarchy. 20 minutes to don/doff unaided, 5 mins aided, Half action to remove helmet. Increases Size to Hulking.
